summary: This is a DOJ Office of the Inspector General memorandum documenting an interview conducted on August 14, 2019, with a BOP Metropolitan Correction Center Lieutenant regarding the events at the MCC on the night of August 9 and morning of August 10, 2019, specifically involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The document notes an administrative error in the forms provided to the Lieutenant.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate at the center of the investigation into the events at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on August 9-10, 2019.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: The subject of the voluntary interview conducted by the OIG and other officials regarding the actions at the MCC involving Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Present at the interview conducted at the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: SA Carpenter
persons.context: FBI Special Agent present at the interview; the document references a video recording with this agent.

persons.name: New York City Police Detective
persons.role: Task Force Officer assigned to the FBI
persons.context: A NYPD detective assigned as a Task Force Officer to the FBI, present at the interview.

connections.description: The DOJ OIG Special Agent interviewed the BOP Lieutenant regarding the events involving Jeffrey Epstein at the MCC.
The Assistant United States Attorney was present for the OIG interview of the Lieutenant, indicating prosecutorial oversight of the investigation.
The FBI Special Agent was present during the OIG's interview of the BOP Lieutenant, indicating a multi-agency investigation.

events.title: Night of events at MCC involving Epstein
events.description: The night at the Metropolitan Correctional Center that preceded the incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Morning of events at MCC involving Epstein
events.description: The morning at the Metropolitan Correctional Center when the incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein occurred.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: An interview was conducted with a BOP MCC Lieutenant by the DOJ OIG, FBI, and SDNY AUSA regarding the events of August 9-10, 2019, involving Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY)
keyFacts: The DOJ OIG interviewed a BOP MCC Lieutenant on August 14, 2019, regarding the actions at the MCC on August 9-10, 2019, specifically involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
The interview was voluntary and related to a criminal investigation.
The OIG Special Agent mistakenly provided the Lieutenant with the wrong DOJ form (III-226/3 instead of III-226/2) at the start of the interview.
All parties present believed the Lieutenant understood her participation was voluntary and not compelled.
The memorandum is dated December 8, 2019, and documents an administrative error in the investigative process.
